IAppDomain.x-deprecatedMessage: For unit testing only. Marked obsolete on NLog 5.0

optimizeBufferReuse.x-deprecatedMessage: No longer used, and always returns true. Marked obsolete on NLog 5.0

layoutWithLock.x-deprecatedMessage: Temporary workaround for broken Layout Renderers that are not threadsafe. Marked obsolete on NLog 5.0

codeBase.x-deprecatedMessage: Assembly.CodeBase and Assembly.EscapedCodeBase are only included for .NET Framework compatibility. Use Assembly.Location.

escapedCodeBase.x-deprecatedMessage: Assembly.CodeBase and Assembly.EscapedCodeBase are only included for .NET Framework compatibility. Use Assembly.Location.

globalAssemblyCache.x-deprecatedMessage: The Global Assembly Cache is not supported.

isNotSerialized.x-deprecatedMessage: Formatter-based serialization is obsolete and should not be used.

childRules.x-deprecatedMessage: Very exotic feature without any unit-tests, not sure if it works. Marked obsolete with NLog v5.3

defaultFilterResult.x-deprecatedMessage: Replaced by FilterDefaultAction. Marked obsolete on NLog 5.0
